title: Interesting Autoattack "bug"
body:
Hey Guys...

Before you read the post below, I need to say, that i have special INGAME settings -> I can attack by only pressing A and it will attack the nearest target.

As I recently was played a normal game with Kalista, I noticed something strange:

When I aa'd the enemies with my cursor on them, I attacked way faster than just pressing 'A' and letting the game attack the nearest target. When i hovered directly over the enemies and attacked them it felt like my AS was 2,0 and when I used 'A' it felt like 1,5.

If you know how to fix that, or why it is like that please tell me because I personally think that this is very stupid and should get fixed.

Thank you in advance for your answers :D


And I am very sorry if this is not well written because I am not that good at English :)

replies.body: You attack faster on Kalista while not jumping.
So this only happens with kalista?

This does only happen with Kalista as she is the only Champion with such mechanism.

Imagine urself throwing things and throwing things whilst jumping.
In which Situation you throw more stuff? :3
